text: [Music]
so um what I would do is I would go into
these places I would collect the writing
which was really a process and sort of
it was like mining for something they
the subjects would write and I would go
back and I would say well what about
this or can you try this or maybe think
about this this just to get it into a
place where it felt like we could
actually put the writing in the book um
and it was of a high standard um and
then I would collect the ephemera from
the environment that I was in like in
Warz I had hundreds of lottery tickets
that I found on the side of the road
like old notebooks um flower sacks
donated by a uh like the world food
program or you know like the Danish
Refugee Council or something like that
so all this ephemera would come back
